title: The Bachelorette 2019: Ciarran Stott's 'gay performing' past exposed
text:
The Bachelorette's Ciarran Stott proved to be the show's biggest personality during Angie Kent's first cocktail party on Wednesday night.

And the 25-year-old Mancunian is certainly no stranger to the spotlight, with a raunchy past performing in Darwin's leading gay nightclub, Throb.

In 2016, the ex-army rifleman would regularly take to the stage in skimpy underwear while entertaining punters alongside drag queens.

Freez'n: The Bachelorette's Ciarran Stott (pictured) is certainly no stranger to the spotlight, with a raunchy past performing in Darwin's leading gay nightclub, Throb

Favourite: Ciarran proved to be the show's biggest personality during Angie Kent's first cocktail party on Wednesday night

Ciarran even starred in a midnight Christmas show in December 2016 titled Camp Christmas: Freezn, which was inspired by Disney movie Frozen.

On the production's poster, Ciarran is seen wearing tiny white hot pants, angel wings and fluffy wellington boots, while posing next to the other performers.

He is barely recognisable without his long blonde locks, and with just a handful of the extensive tattoo collection that he debuted on The Bachelorette.

On StarNow, Ciarran lists himself as an 'actor, extra and model'.

Popular! In 2016, the ex-army rifleman (bottom, left) would regularly take to the stage in skimpy underwear while entertaining punters alongside drag queens. Pictured in 2016

'He's not gay but has always been the centre of attention and loved being up on the stage,' a friend of Ciarran's told Daily Australia on Thursday.

A second insider explained that he 'only worked at Throb for a few months' and has performed as a dancer at other venues in the Northern Territory.

They claim the hunk is 'very well known' in Darwin and 'a really nice guy'.

Secret past! He is barely recognisable without his long blonde locks, and with just a handful of the extensive tattoo collection that he debuted on The Bachelorette. Pictured in 2016

A star! 'He's not gay but has always been the centre of attention and loved being up on the stage,' a friend of Ciarran's told Daily Australia on Thursday. Pictured in 2017

Ciarran looks set to become The Bachelorette's biggest star this year.

After instantly impressing Angie on the red carpet, he later twerked for her, much to the confusion of all of the other contestants.

In an extended trailer, he is seen stripping naked for a life drawing class in front of Angie, her best friend Yvie Jones and the other suitors later in the series.

Daily Mail Australia has reached out to Chanel 10 for comment.

'A really nice guy': A second insider explained that he 'only worked at Throb for a few months' and has performed as a dancer at other venues in the Northern Territory
description: The Bachelorette's Ciarran Stott proved to be the show's biggest personality during Angie Kent's first cocktail party on Wednesday night.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
